EmailTemplate.description: Send mail when SOE status is QA Review.
EmailTemplate.name: QA Request for SOE
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for Quality Analysis
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!ApprovalRequest.Process_Approver}, This mail is regarding approval request of {!SOE__c.Name} after thorough analysis of the SOE, brief details as follows: SOE : {!SOE__c.Name} SOE Name : {!SOE__c.SOE_Title__c} Please click here to check the request
Regards, {!SOE__c.OwnerFullName}.
